text: Let's talk about something REAL that nobody warned me about before my VSG: reactive hypoglycemia 😰 About 1-2 hours after eating, my blood sugar can drop dangerously low. I get shaky, sweaty, anxious, and sometimes feel like I'm going to pass out. It's called post-bariatric hypoglycemia and it affects up to 30% of us post-op. I'm working with my endo on management strategies. If you're experiencing this - you're not alone! Swipe for my tips on managing it 👉 #VSG #BariatricSurgery #PostBariatricHypoglycemia #PBH #RealTalk
